content: quest for a man by laura nelkin this pattern based on my pattern quest #2 in knitty winter 2011 is redesigned with the men in mind enjoy there is an excellent video tutorial for casting on in the round over a small number of sts at http //nelkindesigns com/circularcaston materials schaefer yarn miss priss 100% merino wool 240yd/220m per 112g skein color ash 1 skein or other worsted weight yarn 1 set us #6/4mm double-point needles 16 length-inch us #5/3 75mm circular needle 16 length-inch us #6/4mm circular needle yarn needle stitch marker gauge 22 sts and 28 rnds=4 inches in st st blocked on larger ndls size s m l shown in size m finished measurements 17 5 19 20 5 inches ©laura nelkin 2010 abbreviations small only round 25 knit k- knit round 26 purl kfb- knit into the front and back of the stitch m1r - with tip of left needle pick up bar running between sts from medium only back to front knit it from the front loop round 25 k12 kfb around 112 sts ndl- needle round 26 purl sl- slip round 27 knit st s - stitch es round 28 purl instructions large only round 25 k12 kfb around 112 sts using dpns cast on 8 sts place marker and join into the round round 26 purl around tutorial for casting on in the round http //nelkindesigns com/ round 27 k13 kfb around 120 sts circularcaston round 28 purl round 1 kfb around 16 sts then all sizes round 2 purl rounds 1 6 sl2 k6 around round 3 k1 kfb around 24 sts rounds 7 & 9 knit round 4 knit rounds 8 & 10 purl round 5 sl2 k1 m1r around 32 sts rounds 11 16 k4 sl2 k2 around round 6 sl2 k2 around rounds 17 & 19 knit round 7 sl2 k1 m1r k1 around 40 sts rounds 18 & 20 purl round 8 sl2 k3 around round 9 sl2 k2 m1r k1 around 48 sts repeat rounds 1 -20 twice more ending with a round 18 round 10 sl2 k4 around switch to smaller needles purl one round knit one round repeat round 11 k5 kfb around 56 sts these two rounds once more round 12 purl round 13 k6 kfb around 64 sts bind off weave in ends and block round 14 purl round 15 k7 kfb around 72 sts round 16 purl round 17 k2 sl2 k2 m1r around 84 sts round 18 k2 sl2 k3 around round 19 k2 sl2 k3 around round 20 k2 sl2 k3 m1r around 96 sts round 21 k2 sl2 k4 around round 22 k2 sl2 k4 around round 23 k11 kfb around 104 sts round 24 purl ©laura nelkin 2011 page 2 of 2 www nelkindesigns com laura@nelkindesigns com no duplicating except for personal use
